description:
Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Celestial Spirits:

Convoke the Spirits' cooldown is reduced by 50% and its duration is reduced by 25%. Convoke the Spirits has an increased chance to use an exceptional spell or ability.
Equip: Swiftmend no longer consumes a heal over time effect, and extends the duration of your heal over time effects on the target by 10 sec.
Equip: Chaos Bolt increases the damage of Chaos Bolt by 25% and reduces the cast time of Chaos Bolt by 20% for 4 sec.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Decaying Soul Satchel:

Each target affected by Soul Rot increases your haste and critical strike chance by 5% for 8 sec.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Celestial Spirits:

Convoke the Spirits' cooldown is reduced by 50% and its duration is reduced by 25%. Convoke the Spirits has an increased chance to use an exceptional spell or ability.
Equip: Swiftmend no longer consumes a heal over time effect, and extends the duration of your heal over time effects on the target by 10 sec.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Glory:

Conqueror's Banner affects 1 additional ally and every 20 Rage you spend while it is active increases the duration of your banner by 0.5 sec.
Equip: Your Mortal Strike has a 25% chance to apply the Colossus Smash effect to your target for 6 sec.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Heart of the Fae:

Shifting Power can be channeled while moving. Each enemy hit by Shifting Power grants you 1% Critical Strike and Haste, up to 10% for 15 sec.
Equip: Casting a Frost, Fire and Arcane spell within 10 sec of each other increases your Critical Strike damage of all your spells by 20%. This effect can only occur once every 30 sec.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Shadow Word: Manipulation:

Mindgames lasts an additional 3 sec and reverses an additional 10% damage or healing. When Mindgames can no longer reverse healing or damage, gain 5% Critical Strike for each second remaining for 10 sec.

Equip: Circle of Healing reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Sanctify, Prayer of Mending reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Serenity, and Holy Fire reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Chastise by 4 sec.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Glory:

Conqueror's Banner affects 1 additional ally and every 25 Rage you spend while it is active increases the duration of your banner by 0.5 sec.
Equip: Activating Bladestorm, Recklessness, or Avatar randomly casts one of the other two abilities at reduced effectiveness.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Glory:

Conqueror's Banner affects 1 additional ally and every 20 Rage you spend while it is active increases the duration of your banner by 0.5 sec.
Equip: Your Mortal Strike has a 25% chance to apply the Colossus Smash effect to your target for 6 sec.
Equip: Vanish reduces the remaining cooldown of your other abilities by 20 sec.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Resounding Clarity:

Echoing Reprimand now animacharges 4 combo points.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Glory:

Conqueror's Banner affects 1 additional ally and every 20 Rage you spend while it is active increases the duration of your banner by 0.5 sec.
Equip: Your Mortal Strike has a 25% chance to apply the Colossus Smash effect to your target for 6 sec.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Heart of the Fae:

Shifting Power can be channeled while moving. Each enemy hit by Shifting Power grants you 1% Critical Strike and Haste, up to 10% for 15 sec.
Equip: Casting a Frost, Fire and Arcane spell within 10 sec of each other increases your Critical Strike damage of all your spells by 20%. This effect can only occur once every 30 sec.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Duty-Bound Gavel:

Vanquisher's Hammer gains 1 additional charge. An additional cast of Templar's Verdict will automatically trigger Divine Storm.
Equip: Replaces Templar's Verdict with Final Verdict, a devastating strike that deals 7,593 Holy damage. Has a 15% chance to activate Hammer of Wrath and reset its cooldown.

You and your Kindred Spirit each gain a bonus secondary stat based on their Covenant. This bonus is halved for your Kindred Spirit, however both bonuses are doubled while the bond is Empowered.
